comments.creator: benjamin@smedbergs.us
comments.text: The preferences dialog has an "Update" page. Several people at the platform workweek have tried to find the new update-channel settings from the preferences dialog, but it's not there. I really think we should at least make it accessible from the preferences panel, to avoid confusion of having "update settings" in one place and the "channel settings" in an entirely different dialog.

comments.author: margaret.leibovic@gmail.com
comments.text:
I think this makes sense. However, right now when the user switches to a
different channel in the about dialog, we kick off a check for updates, and the
user sees the existing updater progress UI in the about dialog. If we add a way
to change channels in the preferences dialog, we will need to decide what to do
about the update experience.

As a first approach we could just change the desiredChannel pref, and then the
user will get a build from the new channel the next time an update is
downloaded and applied, but that seems like it would be unsatisfying if the
user wants to immediately get on a different build.
